lyrics:
I'm looking into your eyes
They're shining so very bright
Everything that I dreamed of you brought into my life
You made your way to my heart
Every day I keep falling deeper in love 'cause
it doesn't get better than this, no, no
And I hate every single second apart from you
'cause every breath I take that's away from you
All I can think of, all I wanna do is
Run (run)
Run (run)
Run
straight back into your arms
(Run) run
(Run) run
So nothing can keep me away from you
I run 'til I reach you, that's all I wanna do
You make me wanna
(Run) run
(Run) run
I feel bliss every time we kiss,
every time you touch me
I want it forever, feeling your heart beating next to mine
And I hate every single second apart from you
'cause every breath I take that's away from you
All I can think of, all I wanna do is
Run (run)
Run (run)
Run
straight back into your arms
(Run) run
(Run) run
So nothing can keep me away from you
I run 'til I reach you, that's all I wanna do
You make me wanna
(Run) run
(Run) run
You make me wanna
Run (run)
Run (run)
Run
straight back into your arms
(Run) run
(Run) run
So nothing can keep me away from you
I run 'til I reach you, that's all I wanna do
You make me wanna
(Run) run
(Run) run
Run.
